  • from God's own country, Team Unwired is an ensemble of undergraduate engineering students at the National Institute of Technology Calicut (NITC). Team Unwired strives towards achieving its primary goal which is to use the knowledge and concepts gained in classes and employ them in engineering projects.

OUR SPONSERS

SPONSOR US

Formula Student is a renowned global challenge taken up by auto enthusiasts from over 140 different universities, with the numbers only growing as each racing season progresses. TeamUnwired will be the only team and the very first team from Kerala and among the few from India to compete. A competition that is so vital for an upcoming engineer, giving focus to every aspect to further ones's career. It is important that the awareness of the competition is spread across the nation, encouraging a wider band of team numbers to enter Formula Student. By partnering with TeamUnwired a positive educational cause is fulfilled, allowing better prepared engineers having expertise in an array of areas ready for any changing work environment.

With over 140 teams from different universities participating in the world's largest student motorsport event annually, the media coverage is remarkable. Partnering with TeamUnwired ensures that the team will proudly represent its partners by displaying logos on the car and various other forms throughout the racing season.

Sponsorship is accepted as monetary, part, and technical assistance. If you are interested in sponsoring TeamUnwired please download our marketing brochure for more details or feel free to contact us at any time.
